book.title: The Magic Garden Quest
book.style: black-and-white coloring page, kid-friendly, thick clean outlines, minimal detail, high contrast, no grayscale, no text
book.negative: color, grey, shading, gradients, tiny patterns, cluttered backgrounds, logos, watermarks, photorealism, text, numbers
book.cover_prompt: Bee Zezi smiling over a big simple flower with a glowing heart-shaped seed; friendly garden animal silhouettes; curved path; two big leaves framing top; center composition, large shapes
book.back_blurb: Fly with Bee Zezi through a kind garden of new friends! Color each page and help Zezi find the Kindness Seed.
